channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Reuters hires former Post and AP executive editor Sally Buzbee to lead U.S., Canada news operation
item.description: Reuters has hired Sally Buzbee, former executive editor of the Washington Post and Associated Press, to be its top news editor in the United States and Canada.

item.title: Nvidia rivals focus on building a different kind of chip to power AI products
item.description: Building the current crop of artificial intelligence chatbots has relied on specialized computer chips pioneered by Nvidia, which cornered the market and made itself the poster child of the AI boom.

item.title: Dog fatally attacks woman and bites 2 Boston officers, police say
item.description: Police say a dog fatally attacked a woman and bit two police officers in a Boston neighborhood. The Boston Police Department says that it responded to a report of a dog attack Monday evening and found a woman with life-threatening injuries and a second person injured in the cityâ€™s Roxbury neighborho
